Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch 2.0 - ALAS2LIVEPATCH-2022-091: medium priority package update for kernel-livepatch-4.14.276-211.499
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2022-29581:
	A use-after-free flaw was found in u32_change in net/sched/cls_u32.c in the network subcomponent of the Linux kernel. This flaw allows a local attacker to crash the system, cause a privilege escalation, and leak kernel information.
2088021: CVE-2022-29581 kernel: Improper Update of Reference Count vulnerability in net/sched
